name: brahma

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

variants.name: generator
variants.description: the build system generator to use

description: Interceptor library for I/O calls using Gotcha

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: ninja
dependencies.description:
Ninja is a small build system with a focus on speed. It differs from
other build systems in two major respects: it is designed to have its
input files generated by a higher-level build system, and it is designed
to run builds as fast as possible.

dependencies.name: gotcha
dependencies.description:
C software library for shared library function wrapping, enables tools
to intercept calls into shared libraries

dependencies.name: catch2
dependencies.description:
Catch2 is a multi-paradigm test framework for C++, which also supports
Objective-C (and maybe C).

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description:
An open source Message Passing Interface implementation. The Open MPI
Project is an open source Message Passing Interface implementation that
is developed and maintained by a consortium of academic, research, and
industry partners. Open MPI is therefore able to combine the expertise,
technologies, and resources from all across the High Performance
Computing community in order to build the best MPI library available.
Open MPI offers advantages for system and software vendors, application
developers and computer science researchers.

dependent_to.name: py-dlio-profiler-py
dependent_to.description:
A low-level profiler for capture I/O calls from deep learning
applications.
